timeline.message:
Revert "Implement IShapedRecipe and add new module patchwork-recipes"

This reverts commit b020b67e7391164a458976ae0ea00ff44b8c9f14.

Revert "Implement IShapedRecipe and add new module patchwork-recipes"

This reverts commit c59ede6a0a743c8934341a28e35272fb14b37640.
change the way of getting parent mod container
make sub mods share the same ModFileInfo

Revert "Revert "Annotation Scanning""

This reverts commit b36fc8bac5a127c8b67c44f5b343441556a67391.

Merge branch 'annotation' of https://github.com/qouteall/patchwork-api

 Conflicts:
	patchwork-recipes/src/main/java/net/patchworkmc/mixin/recipes/MixinRecipeGridAligner.java
	settings.gradle

coderbot16

timeline.bodyText: This should probably be a ModContainer argument as well to mirror ModFile.
